Name: Freddy Fryday
Review Text: Tasty loaded fries which can give you a heart already while entering the store. It‚Äôs the perfect experience after a night out with an enormous hangover. The banana milkshake is also to recommend. The pulled chicken was second to none. A bit spicy as well. Tip top.

Name: Freddy Fryday
Review Text: Cozy place with a delicious dish called Funky Freddy Fries, it‚Äôs homemade fries with toppings. Ordered a big pulled pork, portions are generous and really well served. Prices are good, will definitely come back again and try different funky fries.

Name: Freddy Fryday
Review Text: The fries was not fresh at all they seemed to fry it several times. It was the most tasteless fries I got in Amsterdam. Rlly disappointed cuz the pics look so nice

Name: Freddy Fryday
Review Text: I had the pulled pork fries normal size (bigger). It was very nice, no regrets! The fries as base were freshly fried and not very oily. The amount of pulled pork was a happy surprise, quite generous. The onion and the salad are ok, helps to bring some freshness. Given the price, I find it a great value for the money spent.

Name: Freddy Fryday
Review Text: A good comfort food place. Nice portions and friendly prices.

Name: Freddy Fryday
Review Text: First time was delicious  because I ordered the  magic mushroom and second time it was ok,  because  I was not such a big fan of the Vegan pork. They have a variety things on the menu, that I look forward to exploring in the future.

Name: Freddy Fryday
Review Text: Delicious special fries at an affordable price. Team is quick and friendly.

Name: Freddy Fryday
Review Text:
Delicious fries, different toppings (vegan, mushrooms, pork, chicken).
Worth going from another town! üòÉ

Name: Freddy Fryday
Review Text: The chips were so nice. The menu options are excelent. I had the pulled pork with extra cheese and to be honest I wanted to get some chips from this place everyday.

Name: Freddy Fryday
Review Text: Amazing fries!

Name: Freddy Fryday
Review Text: Quick service, excellent chips and a good selection to choose from, from chicken or pork to vegetarian and a vegan option. We chose Mushroom and Mozerella, and the other is with aubergine! Both very delicious.

Name: Freddy Fryday
Review Text: Beef chimichurrriiiii!!! ü§§ get the loaded fries, they are soooo good and decent portion. Also love that they have veggie options (but was my cheat night)

Name: Freddy Fryday
Review Text: Great snackbar when you are tired of regular Dutch snacks. It offer good fries with great stew meat in stead of frikandellen or kroketten. Also delivers.

Name: Freddy Fryday
Review Text: Best self-made fries in Amsterdam Oost. This nice location is worth a visit if you like self-made fries along with a topping or just a typical dutch snack. I had pulled pork as a "topping" and coleslaw. The pulled pork was delicious as well as the fries. You can choose some extra sauces and you'll definitely find a drink in their fridge.

Name: Freddy Fryday
Review Text: Delicious special fries at an affordable price. Team is quick and friendly.

Name: Freddy Fryday
Review Text:
Delicious fries, different toppings (vegan, mushrooms, pork, chicken).

Name: Freddy Fryday
Review Text: We've found it by accident, but it was the best choice to enter. The pulled chicken on fries was delicious and the size of a full meal. Recommended!

Name: Freddy Fryday
Review Text: A really nice twist to the original kapsalon! Nice and unique tastes and overall good value for money.

Name: Freddy Fryday
Review Text: People were very helpful and the fries were some of the best in Amsterdam!

Name: Freddy Fryday
Review Text: Quite nice fries. Took the beef stew, I'd happily eat it again. The portion size was accurate.

Name: Freddy Fryday
Review Text: If you're fed up with exuberant prices at the heart of Amsterdam, take a trip out here to Freddy Friday and have yourself some good old Poutine style fries. Make sure not to miss the light festival in winter or the zoo in summer to get away from the tourist crowds... Or rather: to feel like a real Dutchie.

Name: Freddy Fryday

Name: Freddy Fryday
Review Text: What a great idea, and a great execution of that idea! We walked past on our way to fancypants dinner, and joked that we should just go here instead. Glad we didn't (DeKas was excellent), but we did go back the next day for a mid-afternoon ‚Ä¶

Review Text: Their fries are amazing and having tried all the toppings I still can't decide which is best. Run by a young team who noticeably take pride in what they do this is by far the best snackbar in Amsterdam East.
